TopicTitle: what mighty mouse do you use to lift rocket in ksp ? ×

Articles.Content:
Well this thread is inspired by this cute video thumbnail, generic theme and lyrics:

Mister Trouble never hangs around 
When he hears this Mighty sound. 

"Here I come to save the day" 

That means that Mighty Mouse is on his way. 
Yes sir, when there is a wrong to right 
Mighty Mouse will join the fight. 
On the sea or on the land, 
He gets the situation well in hand.
 

rule:

pretty simple share stuff about your mouse and eventually comments about yours or others contributors mouse keep things fun and cool.
(non mouse users are welcome to because well evolution is like that ; )

1 - :

Mine really start looking like this

and this are it's best friends because well getting old is hard even for a computer mouse

but who said lifting rocket in ksp is an easy task ? ; )

 

 

Edited April 18, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
A wireless mouse and keyboard. WITH NO RIGHT CLICK, F9, AND F1!!!

I use the Roccat Kone Pure with the color scheme you see here from my girlfriend.
It was succesfully won by her. She had to convince the judges why she thought she deserved it. Something to do with being a girl gamer.

Looks sexy eh? Now it has some smudges running where the edges of our fingers rest...

I must say, I've had my share of mice, from Logitech to Razer and some inbetween, but I like the ones from Roccat the best!
Good hardware and software.
